name: Thundering Appetites
description: Upon use, immediately heals a single ally by 24% of their Max HP plus 300 extra Max HP.
story:
Your lips and tongue yearn for juicy meat, your stomach craving to be filled â€” even the air seems to carry the scent of charcoal. Your belly emits a thunderous roar, and you struggle to maintain control.

"There are few desires in this world that are as insatiable as this one."
